snippet: Shane Van Williams is accused of fatally shooting Rendell Cassimy and his brother Sean with the same bullet, nine days after Shane was released from prison.
abstract: Michael Wilson Crime Scene column offers narrative of troubled brothers Shane and Sean Van Williams, who lived together in Rochdale Village apartment complex in Queens; days out of prison, Shane intervened in fight between brother Sean and Rendell Cassimy, allegedly killing both when bullet he fired passed through Cassimy and struck his brother in the head.
lead_paragraph: Shane Van Williams is accused of fatally shooting Rendell Cassimy and his brother Sean with the same bullet, nine days after Shane was released from prison.

headline.print_headline: 2 Troubled Brothers Are Reunited, Then Torn Apart by an Errant Bullet
headline.main: 2 Troubled Brothers Are Reunited, Then Torn Apart by an Errant Bullet
